name: FragTime
description:
FragTime is a fast and frantic single-player arena shooter with robot dismantling weaponry Please note this game is currently pre-alpha and I've not got much idea for where exactly it should go but I feel the mechanics are ripe for experimentation. Gameplay
  • Duel colour ammo and enemies where opposites cause double damage
  • All weapons share the same ammo pool
  • Quake based movement and knockback physics
  • 3 Difficulties that alter the enemy physics and weapons
  • 2 Arenas to fight in
  • 4 Weapons including an Infinite Pistol, Double Shotty, Plasma Cannon and Rocket Launcher
  • 1 Robot enemy type
  • Wave based, time-target game mode.
Other features
  • Rapid robot deconstruction
  • Copious amounts of robot oil
  • Full controls remapping
Please let me know what you think to the game on the discussion board and I hope you find it fun!
